transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji madam ho gaya.
Executive: Ho gaya hai sir maine aapke sir jo primary wala number hai usme maine invoices ki PDF bhej di thi sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai ek baar dusre number pe bhej sakte ho aap ek baar haan match kar leta main.
Executive: Haan bhej deti hu. Ji ji bilkul sir. Sir actually aapne company customer care pe call kiya tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To sir wo concern mujhe close karna hai sir close kar du main sir. Main aapko PDF bhej de rahi hu thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai. Number bata raha hu main us pe bhejna abhi ye ye number hai aapke paas mein 99 wala.
Executive: Haan 99 wale pe hi to maine abhi kiya hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai koi nahi thik hai fir to madam kar do usko close kar do.
Executive: Thik hai isi mein bhej du sir main aapke.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai okay okay main bhej rahi hu sir ji.
Customer: Thik hai madam.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested invoice on another number.



Resolution:

- Executive sent invoice PDF on primary number.

- Agreed to close the concern.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- invoice, pdf, customer care, close
